synthesis_conditions.method: An aqueous solution of Co(NO3)2·6H2O, bpy, and fdcH2 were stirred in hot condition and filtrates were kept for evaporation.
An aqueous solution of Co(NO3)2·6H2O, bpy, and btcH3 were stirred in hot condition and filtrates were kept for evaporation.
An aqueous solution of Co(NO3)2·6H2O, bpy, and btecH4 were stirred in hot condition and filtrates were kept for evaporation.
